name: NHL '94
overview: The siren is going to wail tonight - OVER 25 NEW FEATURES IN HOCKEY '94 5-Player support - Play with anywhere between 1 and 5 players. New player art and animations - A whole new look for '94 Goalie Control - You control the double pad stacks and kick saves of all the greatest goalies in the league - Belfour, Potvin, Fuhr... Penalty Shots and Shootout Mode - Pick the hottest shooters and go head to head with the greatest goalies in the league. One Timers - New blistering slap shots make offense faster and more challenging. Harder hitting defenders - New cross checks and board checks ring up opposing puckhandlers. Individualized Arenas - Over 70 new pieces of organ music and crowd animations.
